Keywords: Hellfire Club , Hellions , Marauders , Politician , Quiet Council , Utopia , X-Men
Real Name: Emma Frost
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. When Emma Frost uses Mind Control, you may replace a die in the attack roll with her RALLY die. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls. When a character gains a RALLY die, place a die with the matching result on their card.)
A LITTLE HELP FROM CEREBRA: FREE: Choose an [Improved Targeting] to use until your next turn (Elevated, Hindering, Blocking, Destroy Blocking, Characters, or Adjacent). You may choose an additional [Improved Targeting] for each action token on Emma Frost.
A BODY MADE OF DIAMOND: STOP. Impervious.

Comments
December 20, 2021
tyroclix
WIN/LOSS: 3-0 Emma at 125 is so expensive... but dang is she a solid piece. Her cheesey see through things is what keeps her from feeling bloated. Give her a side-stepping taxi and she wrecks. Mind Control loads of pieces safely, Psy-Blast some fools that are in the fight - I really want to try her out at 75 (which I thought would be the only level I'd play her at) but the PC at 8 range and the pen 12/4 is really, really good. (Played in a 500 point game / 5 figures max)
November 21, 2021
fastcat99
Team her with Voyager on the Latveria town map! Shoot a hole in the middle of blocking terrain and stick her there for maximum effect.
August 26, 2021
Maxphyte
I didn’t get to use her at 125 but I did wreck with her at her lower line. I also did so without realizing that she could use more improved targeting when she has action tokens. I personally believe in normal games she is worth her point cost at both levels simply because she has access to improved targeting: blocking. While it is fun to use with attacks, it should not be given to characters who can use it to make attacks.
August 23, 2021
metaldrumer6six6
She was my mvp and was teamed up with Emperor Gladiator. She MCed nonstop having the other team beat eachother up and set up Gladiator's shots. She's a keeper for sure!
August 12, 2021
Dortmuner
I'm torn. I like her a lot. Three target MC with solid range and pretty much any IT you need to hit. Decent dial length with a STOP click. PC and Outwit for support. But her defense is limited and you can buy three to four other clix with the points you're using for her. I'm still gonna use her in fun games.
August 12, 2021
Goop
Not worth 125 points by any stretch, there are way cheaper figures that can do big MCs with improved targeting. Should only be considered at her 75point line.
